definitions.definition: An infectious bacterial disease of cattle and swine , sometimes transmitted to humans, characterized by the formation of painful abscesses in the mouth, lungs, or gastrointestinal tract , caused by Actinomyces israelii , Actinomyces gerencseriae , and Propionibacterium propionicum .

main_definition: ( pathology ) An infectious bacterial disease of cattle and swine , sometimes transmitted to humans, characterized by the formation of painful abscesses in the mouth, lungs, or gastrointestinal tract , caused by Actinomyces israelii , Actinomyces gerencseriae , and Propionibacterium propionicum .
